scripts.test:all: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" & cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet test && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm test
scripts.test:server: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" & cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet test
scripts.format: dotnet format SeventySix.Server/SeventySix.Server.slnx && cd SeventySix.Client && npm run cleanup
scripts.start:docker: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }"
scripts.start:api-debug: cd SeventySix.Server && docker compose up -d postgres jaeger prometheus --no-deps && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm start
scripts.start:all: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" & cd SeventySix.Server && docker compose up -d --build --force-recreate && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm start
scripts.kill:api-ports: powershell -Command "$ports = @(5085, 7074); foreach($port in $ports) { $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($conn) { Stop-Process -Id $conn.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }"
